title: Bringing Heaven Home - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/18/21
itunes:title: Bringing Heaven Home - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/18/21
description:
George Noory and Dr. Brent Satterfield explore his experiences in Heaven following a series of near death experiences, what insights he learned from visiting with Jesus, and why he no longer fears dying.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
